channel.title: Auxy 3rd party PLUGIN SUPPORT?
channel.description: Now, ive been keeping my eye on something like this.... it would be cool if you can use 3rd party plugins for auxy (Kinda like garageband).... i mean that would be a game changer, anyone agree??

item.title: Auxy 3rd party PLUGIN SUPPORT?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
It would be great but can’t imagine it would happen for a myriad of reasons. There’s lots of other awesome hosts out there though (some of my favorites include Nanostudio and Aum).

Would rather see Auxy devs produce their own AUv3 in some capacity than have it become an AU host, just can’t imagine what a nightmare the UI would be and without any kind of proper midi routing I really don’t know how things like automation would map to CCs for different plugins…

Read full topic
